document.full_text: sudden bursts of moderate to intense physical activity -- such as jogging or having sex -- significantly increase the risk of having a heart attack, especially in people who do not get regular exercise, u.s. researchers said on tuesday.
document.title: yes, sex can kill you, u.s. study shows
lines_and_colors: sudden bursts of moderate to intense physical activity -- such as jogging or having sex -- significantly increase the risk of having a heart attack, especially in people who do not get regular exercise, u.s. researchers said on tuesday.
